ModuleClass.name: BooleanState
ModuleClass.Doc: BooleanState is the preferred module for modelling a functionality corresponding to an underlying binary state. This module should be used to abstract away from the actual datatype and values in question. Note that the module does not define whether the execution mode is blocking or non-blocking.

Action.name: setTarget
Action.Doc: Set the associated state to the specified value.

Arg.name: value
Arg.Doc: The desired value of the associated state.
